title: Feed navigation times out even when feed API succeeds with 0 events
description: arlog reports a timeout error trying to fetch the feed, but observing Playwright shows the feed API call actually succeeds â€” it just returns a feedcount of 0 (no events to fetch). The page never reaches networkidle because it keeps waiting for feed data that won't come, eventually hitting the 60s timeout. Need to handle the case where the feed API responds successfully but with 0 results, instead of treating it as a navigation failure.
close_reason: Replaced networkidle with domcontentloaded + explicit feed API response polling

title: Push notifications via ntfy.sh for new Arlo events
description: Send push notifications to phone via ntfy.sh when new Arlo events are detected. The ntfy topic/channel ID should be configured via ARLOG_NTFY_TOPIC in the .env file. Notifications should be sent for each new event inserted into the database, with a descriptive message including device name and event type.
close_reason: Implemented ntfy.sh push notifications for new Arlo events
